title: Dialogos beyond nihilism
description:
Guy Sengstock, Chris Mastropietro, and myself enter into dialogos about how the practice of dialectic into dialogos can enable people to transform the nothingness of nihilism into the no-thingness of transcendence.

Guy's channel:  https://www.youtube.com/user/82472tclt
